title: Kenji Mizoguchi - The Water Magician
description:
Kenji Mizoguchi - Taki no shiraito aka The Water Magician
and Tokyo koshin-kyoku AKA Tokyo March <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0024641/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0024641/</a> <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0020510/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0020510/</a>

from Talking Silents 1

[IMG]http://i277.photobucket.com/albums/kk75/otr2damascus/talking_silents00.jpg[/IMG]

Language	Japanese "Benshi" narration
Subtitles	included: Japanese English Chinese Korean sub/idx

[QUOTE]Taki no Shiraito is a very independent young woman with a famous water juggling act in a travelling carnival troupe. She falls in love with an orphaned carriage driver Kinya Murakoshi, and pledges to put him through law school in Tokyo. She always encloses money in her letters to him, until one hard winter there is no work to be found.[/QUOTE]

~~~~~~ The Water Magician.avi ~~~~~~
